de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.query

Interface DistanceSimilarityQuery<O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - Object type
    All Superinterfaces:
    DatabaseQuery, DistanceQuery<O>, SimilarityQuery<O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrimitiveDistanceSimilarityQuery

    public interface DistanceSimilarityQuery<O>
extends DistanceQuery<O>, SimilarityQuery<O>
    Interface that is a combination of distance and a similarity function. For combined implementations of both.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
